DOC.criteria: Male , age range : 25 65 year Nonsmoker Proteinuria : < 60 mg/24 hour Dipstick negative hematuria Bloodpressure : < 135 mm systolic , < 85 mm dyastolic Waist circumference : < 94 cm Treatment lipidlowering drug < 1 year prior study Known history diabetes fast glucose level : < 110 mg/dl Antihypertensive medication Lifeexpectancy < 1 year Pharmacological treatment inotropes Acute chronic inflammatory process , use antiinflammatory drug immunosuppression Clinically active malignant disease Administration investigational drug within 30 day precede study start study Known intolerance rosuvastatin statins Acute chronic liver disease ALAT > 2.0 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) enrolment visit . Chronic muscle disease dermatomyositis polymyositis unexplained creatinine kinase ( CK ) 3 x ULN enrolment . Uncontrolled hypothyroidism indicate thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) > 2 x ULN enrolment . Renal insufficiency : creatinine > 2.0mg/dl Known suspect alcohol drug abuse .
